General.Name: Answear.com S.A.
General.Description: Answear.com S.A. operates as an online multi-brand fashion retailer in Poland, the Czech Republic, Slovakia, Hungary, Romania, Bulgaria, Ukraine, Greece, Croatia, and Cyprus. It sells clothing, footwear, and accessories for women, men, and children through its Answear.com platform. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Kraków, Poland.

1.Name: Mr. Adam  Wojcikowski
1.Title: VP of the Management Board of Fin.
